item.description: Get into the Chanukah spirit! Let you and your child discover the unique pride of biting into their fruits of their labor! They will learn all about measurements, baking and Chanukah, while having fun all along the way. Each child and parent will make their own yummy donut, with their choice of fillings and toppings. 6:00pm- musical havdalah followed by our donut making class! 5$ per person Ages 2 and up

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Kids In The Kitchen - Donut Making!
